title: Ember
description: One decision changed her life forever. One choice could seal her fate for eternity.By accepting her destiny, Calliope entered the enchanting world of Faylinn. She wasn’t prepared for all the compromises she would be forced to make. After being thrown into her duties as queen, she must pick her battles wisely or risk loosing the respect of her kingdom.With Kai and Declan by her side her confidence rises, but they can’t protect her from everything. When Faylinn is threatened Calliope is forced to face an even greater reality than she was prepared for. Haunted by the truthfulness of Favner’s last words, she realizes she has no idea what she’s gotten herself into.Can Calliope be able to hold true to Faylinn’s beliefs while still following her heart, or will she be forced to sacrifice a part of herself to save her kingdom?
author: Mindy Hayes
